mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT tran_id FROM core.transaction WHERE tran_id = #{transactionId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO core.transaction (tran_id, acco_id, amount, ccy, direction, description, status, inserted_timestamp) VALUES (#{dto.transactionId}, #{dto.accountId}, #{dto.amount.amount}, #{dto.amount.currency}, #{dto.direction}, #{dto.description}, #{status}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
